categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The Freerunner was a heavily armored, modular repulsorcraft with rotating gun platforms manufactured by Kelliak. Although its open-air cockpit limited environmental deployments, it saw use in the ground forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. With its resilience and firepower, the Freerunner was the strongest armored vehicle in the Alliance's arsenal.
